attributes.action: make forces pensions past and present tax free
attributes.additional_details:
the government to stop the treasury taxing forces pension.  this may be the only income for some people and will cause a financial hardship especially now in the current economic climate.  they have earned this by being available 24 hours a day 365 days a year to put their life on the line to not only to protect our country but others as well.
therefore they have earned their pension the hard way with out further burdens on them with onerous taxes as well.
